snippet: The judge in the trial of Oscar Pistorius, the double-amputee track star accused of murdering his girlfriend, said that proceedings would be postponed after hearings ended on Thursday.
abstract: Judge in trial of Oscar Pistorius, double-amputee track star accused of murdering his girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp, says proceedings will be postponed after hearings ended until May 5, two days before South Africa’s national election.
lead_paragraph: The judge in the trial of Oscar Pistorius, the double-amputee track star accused of murdering his girlfriend, said that proceedings would be postponed after hearings ended on Thursday.

headline.main: Pistorius Trial to Adjourn This Week Until May 5, Days Before Election
headline.print_headline: Pistorius Trial to Adjourn This Week Until May 5, Days Before Election
